Class PersonService

java.lang.Object
com.mediLaboSolutions.T2D2Patient.service.PersonService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPersonService
@Service public class PersonService extends Object implements IPersonService
A service class which performs the business processes relating to the POJO Address before calling the repository.

    • getPersonByEmail

      public Person getPersonByEmail(String personEmail)
      A GET method that returns an Person whose email is passed as a parameter after calling the findByEmail() derived query from repository.
      Specified by:
      getPersonByEmail in interface IPersonService
      Returns:
      A Person.
      Singularity :
      An empty object must be returned if the person doesn't exists, in order to deal with observables into HTML file of the component, without subscribing it in the TS file component.

    • createPerson

      public Person createPerson(Person newPerson) throws Exception
      A POST method that returns the Person passed as parameter if she is created, and calls the JpaRepository save() method.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
      A User OR null if the person is already in the database.

      Exception

      Returns:
